name: Teddy Afro
description: '''Tewodros Kassahun Germamo''' ({{langx|am|ቴዎድሮስ ካሳሁን ገርማሞ}}; born 14 July 1976), known professionally as '''Teddy Afro''', is an Ethiopian singer-songwriter. Known by his [[revolutionary song]]s and [[political dissent]] sentiment, Teddy is considered one of the most significant Ethiopian artists of all time. Teddy has had a huge cultural impact on the [[Ethiopian music]] industry and has been a big influence on many young artists.
